alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 12 at 4:18AM MDT until October 12 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28. For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Central and southern San Luis Valley. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM MDT this morning. For the Hard Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 9 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley
